card.name: AEther Tide
card.text: As an additional cost to cast AEther Tide, discard X creature cards. Return X target creatures to their owners' hands.

card.name: Allay
card.text: Buyback {3} Destroy target enchantment.

card.name: Anarchist
card.text: When Anarchist enters the battlefield, you may return target sorcery card from your graveyard to your hand.

card.name: Angelic Blessing
card.text: Target creature gets +3/+3 and gains flying until end of turn.

card.name: Avenging Druid
card.text: Whenever Avenging Druid deals damage to an opponent, you may reveal cards from the top of your library until you reveal a land card. If you do, put that card onto the battlefield and put all other cards revealed this way into your graveyard.

card.name: Bequeathal
card.text: Enchant creature When enchanted creature dies, you draw two cards.

card.name: Carnophage
card.text: At the beginning of your upkeep, tap Carnophage unless you pay 1 life.

card.name: Cartographer
card.text: When Cartographer enters the battlefield, you may return target land card from your graveyard to your hand.

card.name: Cat Burglar
card.text: {2}{B}, {T}: Target player discards a card. Activate this ability only any time you could cast a sorcery.

card.name: Cataclysm
card.text: Each player chooses from the permanents he or she controls an artifact, a creature, an enchantment, and a land, then sacrifices the rest.

card.name: Charging Paladin
card.text: Whenever Charging Paladin attacks, it gets +0/+3 until end of turn.

card.name: Cinder Crawler
card.text: {R}: Cinder Crawler gets +1/+0 until end of turn. Activate this ability only if Cinder Crawler is blocked.

card.name: City of Traitors
card.text: When you play another land, sacrifice City of Traitors. {T}: Add {C}{C} to your mana pool.

card.name: Coat of Arms
card.text: Each creature gets +1/+1 for each other creature on the battlefield that shares at least one creature type with it.

card.name: Convalescence
card.text: At the beginning of your upkeep, if you have 10 or less life, you gain 1 life.

card.name: Crashing Boars
card.text: Whenever Crashing Boars attacks, defending player chooses an untapped creature he or she controls. That creature blocks Crashing Boars this turn if able.

card.name: Culling the Weak
card.text: As an additional cost to cast Culling the Weak, sacrifice a creature. Add {B}{B}{B}{B} to your mana pool.

card.name: Cunning
card.text: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +3/+3. When enchanted creature attacks or blocks, sacrifice Cunning at the beginning of the next cleanup step.

card.name: Curiosity
card.text: Enchant creature Whenever enchanted creature deals damage to an opponent, you may draw a card.

card.name: Cursed Flesh
card.text: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets -1/-1 and has fear.

card.name: Dauthi Cutthroat
card.text: Shadow {1}{B}, {T}: Destroy target creature with shadow.

card.name: Dauthi Jackal
card.text: Shadow {B}{B}, Sacrifice Dauthi Jackal: Destroy target blocking creature.

card.name: Dauthi Warlord
card.text: Shadow Dauthi Warlord's power is equal to the number of creatures with shadow on the battlefield.

card.name: Death's Duet
card.text: Return two target creature cards from your graveyard to your hand.

card.name: Dizzying Gaze
card.text: Enchant creature you control {R}: Enchanted creature deals 1 damage to target creature with flying.

card.name: Dominating Licid
card.text: {1}{U}{U}, {T}: Dominating Licid loses this ability and becomes an Aura enchantment with enchant creature. Attach it to target creature. You may pay {U} to end this effect. You control enchanted creature.

card.name: Elven Palisade
card.text: Sacrifice a Forest: Target attacking creature gets -3/-0 until end of turn.

card.name: Elvish Berserker
card.text: Whenever Elvish Berserker becomes blocked, it gets +1/+1 until end of turn for each creature blocking it.

card.name: Entropic Specter
card.text: Flying As Entropic Specter enters the battlefield, choose an opponent. Entropic Specter's power and toughness are each equal to the number of cards in the chosen player's hand. Whenever Entropic Specter deals damage to a player, that player discards a card.

card.name: Ephemeron
card.text: Flying Discard a card: Return Ephemeron to its owner's hand.

card.name: Equilibrium
card.text: Whenever you cast a creature spell, you may pay {1}. If you do, return target creature to its owner's hand.

card.name: Erratic Portal
card.text: {1}, {T}: Return target creature to its owner's hand unless its controller pays {1}.

card.name: Ertai, Wizard Adept
card.text: {2}{U}{U}, {T}: Counter target spell.

card.name: Exalted Dragon
card.text: Flying Exalted Dragon can't attack unless you sacrifice a land.

card.name: Fade Away
card.text: For each creature, its controller sacrifices a permanent unless he or she pays {1}.

card.name: Fighting Chance
card.text: For each blocking creature, flip a coin. If you win the flip, prevent all combat damage that would be dealt by that creature this turn.

card.name: Flowstone Flood
card.text: Buyback - Pay 3 life, Discard a card at random. Destroy target land.

card.name: Forbid
card.text: Buyback - Discard two cards. Counter target spell.

card.name: Fugue
card.text: Target player discards three cards.

card.name: Furnace Brood
card.text: {R}: Target creature can't be regenerated this turn.

card.name: Grollub
card.text: Whenever Grollub is dealt damage, each opponent gains that much life.

card.name: Hatred
card.text: As an additional cost to cast Hatred, pay X life. Target creature gets +X/+0 until end of turn.

card.name: High Ground
card.text: Each creature you control can block an additional creature.

card.name: Jackalope Herd
card.text: When you cast a spell, return Jackalope Herd to its owner's hand.

card.name: Keeper of the Beasts
card.text: {G}, {T}: Choose target opponent who controlled more creatures than you did as you activated this ability. Put a 2/2 green Beast creature token onto the battlefield.

card.name: Keeper of the Dead
card.text: {B}, {T}: Choose target opponent who had at least two fewer creature cards in his or her graveyard than you did as you activated this ability. Destroy target nonblack creature he or she controls.

card.name: Keeper of the Flame
card.text: {R}, {T}: Choose target opponent who had more life than you did as you activated this ability. Keeper of the Flame deals 2 damage to him or her.

card.name: Keeper of the Light
card.text: {W}, {T}: Choose target opponent who had more life than you did as you activated this ability. You gain 3 life.

card.name: Keeper of the Mind
card.text: {U}, {T}: Choose target opponent who had at least two more cards in hand than you did as you activated this ability. Draw a card.

card.name: Killer Whale
card.text: {U}: Killer Whale gains flying until end of turn.

card.name: Kor Chant
card.text: All damage that would be dealt this turn to target creature you control by a source of your choice is dealt to another target creature instead.

card.name: Limited Resources
card.text: When Limited Resources enters the battlefield, each player chooses five lands he or she controls and sacrifices the rest. Players can't play lands as long as ten or more lands are on the battlefield.

card.name: Mage il-Vec
card.text: {T}, Discard a card at random: Mage il-Vec deals 1 damage to target creature or player.

card.name: Mana Breach
card.text: Whenever a player casts a spell, that player returns a land he or she controls to its owner's hand.

card.name: Manabond
card.text: At the beginning of your end step, you may reveal your hand and put all land cards from it onto the battlefield. If you do, discard your hand.

card.name: Maniacal Rage
card.text: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +2/+2 and can't block.

card.name: Medicine Bag
card.text: {1}, {T}, Discard a card: Regenerate target creature.

card.name: Memory Crystal
card.text: Buyback costs cost {2} less.

card.name: Merfolk Looter
card.text: {T}: Draw a card, then discard a card.

card.name: Mind Maggots
card.text: When Mind Maggots enters the battlefield, discard any number of creature cards. For each card discarded this way, put two +1/+1 counters on Mind Maggots.

card.name: Mind Over Matter
card.text: Discard a card: You may tap or untap target artifact, creature, or land.

card.name: Mindless Automaton
card.text: Mindless Automaton enters the battlefield with two +1/+1 counters on it. {1}, Discard a card: Put a +1/+1 counter on Mindless Automaton. Remove two +1/+1 counters from Mindless Automaton: Draw a card.

card.name: Mirozel
card.text: Flying When Mirozel becomes the target of a spell or ability, return Mirozel to its owner's hand.

card.name: Mirri, Cat Warrior
card.text: First strike, forestwalk, vigilance

card.name: Mogg Assassin
card.text: {T}: You choose target creature an opponent controls, and that opponent chooses target creature. Flip a coin. If you win the flip, destroy the creature you chose. If you lose the flip, destroy the creature your opponent chose.

card.name: Monstrous Hound
card.text: Monstrous Hound can't attack unless you control more lands than defending player. Monstrous Hound can't block unless you control more lands than attacking player.

card.name: Nausea
card.text: All creatures get -1/-1 until end of turn.

card.name: Necrologia
card.text: Cast Necrologia only during your end step. As an additional cost to cast Necrologia, pay X life. Draw X cards.

card.name: Null Brooch
card.text: {2}, {T}, Discard your hand: Counter target noncreature spell.

card.name: Oath of Druids
card.text: At the beginning of each player's upkeep, that player chooses target player who controls more creatures than he or she does and is his or her opponent. The first player may reveal cards from the top of his or her library until he or she reveals a creature card. If he or she does, that player puts that card onto the battlefield and all other cards revealed this way into his or her graveyard.

card.name: Oath of Ghouls
card.text: At the beginning of each player's upkeep, that player chooses target player whose graveyard has fewer creature cards in it than his or her graveyard does and is his or her opponent. The first player may return a creature card from his or her graveyard to his or her hand.

card.name: Oath of Lieges
card.text: At the beginning of each player's upkeep, that player chooses target player who controls more lands than he or she does and is his or her opponent. The first player may search his or her library for a basic land card, put that card onto the battlefield, then shuffle his or her library.

card.name: Oath of Mages
card.text: At the beginning of each player's upkeep, that player chooses target player who has more life than he or she does and is his or her opponent. The first player may have Oath of Mages deal 1 damage to the second player.

card.name: Oath of Scholars
card.text: At the beginning of each player's upkeep, that player chooses target player who has more cards in hand than he or she does and is his or her opponent. The first player may discard his or her hand and draw three cards.

card.name: Ogre Shaman
card.text: {2}, Discard a card at random: Ogre Shaman deals 2 damage to target creature or player.

card.name: Onslaught
card.text: Whenever you cast a creature spell, tap target creature.

card.name: Paladin en-Vec
card.text: First strike, protection from black and from red

card.name: Pandemonium
card.text: Whenever a creature enters the battlefield, that creature's controller may have it deal damage equal to its power to target creature or player of his or her choice.

card.name: Paroxysm
card.text: Enchant creature At the beginning of the upkeep of enchanted creature's controller, that player reveals the top card of his or her library. If that card is a land card, destroy that creature. Otherwise, it gets +3/+3 until end of turn.

card.name: Peace of Mind
card.text: {W}, Discard a card: You gain 3 life.

card.name: Pegasus Stampede
card.text: Buyback - Sacrifice a land. Put a 1/1 white Pegasus creature token with flying onto the battlefield.

card.name: Penance
card.text: Put a card from your hand on top of your library: The next time a black or red source of your choice would deal damage this turn, prevent that damage.

card.name: Pit Spawn
card.text: First strike At the beginning of your upkeep, sacrifice Pit Spawn unless you pay {B}{B}. Whenever Pit Spawn deals damage to a creature, exile that creature.

card.name: Plaguebearer
card.text: {X}{X}{B}: Destroy target nonblack creature with converted mana cost X.

card.name: Plated Rootwalla
card.text: {2}{G}: Plated Rootwalla gets +3/+3 until end of turn. Activate this ability only once each turn.

card.name: Predatory Hunger
card.text: Enchant creature Whenever an opponent casts a creature spell, put a +1/+1 counter on enchanted creature.

card.name: Price of Progress
card.text: Price of Progress deals damage to each player equal to twice the number of nonbasic lands that player controls.

card.name: Pygmy Troll
card.text: Whenever Pygmy Troll becomes blocked by a creature, Pygmy Troll gets +1/+1 until end of turn. {G}: Regenerate Pygmy Troll.

card.name: Rabid Wolverines
card.text: Whenever Rabid Wolverines becomes blocked by a creature, Rabid Wolverines gets +1/+1 until end of turn.

card.name: Ravenous Baboons
card.text: When Ravenous Baboons enters the battlefield, destroy target nonbasic land.

card.name: Reaping the Rewards
card.text: Buyback - Sacrifice a land. You gain 2 life.

card.name: Reckless Ogre
card.text: Whenever Reckless Ogre attacks alone, it gets +3/+0 until end of turn.

card.name: Reclaim
card.text: Put target card from your graveyard on top of your library.

card.name: Reconnaissance
card.text: {0}: Remove target attacking creature you control from combat and untap it.

card.name: Recurring Nightmare
card.text: Sacrifice a creature, Return Recurring Nightmare to its owner's hand: Return target creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield. Activate this ability only any time you could cast a sorcery.

card.name: Resuscitate
card.text: Until end of turn, creatures you control gain "{1}: Regenerate this creature."

card.name: Robe of Mirrors
card.text: Enchant creature Enchanted creature has shroud.

card.name: Rootwater Alligator
card.text: Sacrifice a Forest: Regenerate Rootwater Alligator.

card.name: Rootwater Mystic
card.text: {1}{U}: Look at the top card of target player's library.

card.name: Sabertooth Wyvern
card.text: Flying, first strike

card.name: Scalding Salamander
card.text: Whenever Scalding Salamander attacks, you may have it deal 1 damage to each creature without flying defending player controls.

card.name: Scare Tactics
card.text: Creatures you control get +1/+0 until end of turn.

card.name: School of Piranha
card.text: At the beginning of your upkeep, sacrifice School of Piranha unless you pay {1}{U}.

card.name: Scrivener
card.text: When Scrivener enters the battlefield, you may return target instant card from your graveyard to your hand.

card.name: Seismic Assault
card.text: Discard a land card: Seismic Assault deals 2 damage to target creature or player.

card.name: Shackles
card.text: Enchant creature Enchanted creature doesn't untap during its controller's untap step. {W}: Return Shackles to its owner's hand.

card.name: Shattering Pulse
card.text: Buyback {3} Destroy target artifact.

card.name: Shield Mate
card.text: Sacrifice Shield Mate: Target creature gets +0/+4 until end of turn.

card.name: Skyshaper
card.text: Sacrifice Skyshaper: Creatures you control gain flying until end of turn.

card.name: Skyshroud Elite
card.text: Skyshroud Elite gets +1/+2 as long as an opponent controls a nonbasic land.

card.name: Skyshroud War Beast
card.text: Trample As Skyshroud War Beast enters the battlefield, choose an opponent. Skyshroud War Beast's power and toughness are each equal to the number of nonbasic lands the chosen player controls.

card.name: Slaughter
card.text: Buyback - Pay 4 life. Destroy target nonblack creature. It can't be regenerated.

card.name: Soltari Visionary
card.text: Shadow Whenever Soltari Visionary deals damage to a player, destroy target enchantment that player controls.

card.name: Song of Serenity
card.text: Creatures that are enchanted can't attack or block.

card.name: Sonic Burst
card.text: As an additional cost to cast Sonic Burst, discard a card at random. Sonic Burst deals 4 damage to target creature or player.

card.name: Soul Warden
card.text: Whenever another creature enters the battlefield, you gain 1 life.

card.name: Spellbook
card.text: You have no maximum hand size.

card.name: Spellshock
card.text: Whenever a player casts a spell, Spellshock deals 2 damage to that player.

card.name: Sphere of Resistance
card.text: Spells cost {1} more to cast.

card.name: Spike Cannibal
card.text: Spike Cannibal enters the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter on it. When Spike Cannibal enters the battlefield, move all +1/+1 counters from all creatures onto it.

card.name: Spike Hatcher
card.text: Spike Hatcher enters the battlefield with six +1/+1 counters on it. {2}, Remove a +1/+1 counter from Spike Hatcher: Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature. {1}, Remove a +1/+1 counter from Spike Hatcher: Regenerate Spike Hatcher.

card.name: Spike Rogue
card.text: Spike Rogue enters the battlefield with two +1/+1 counters on it. {2}, Remove a +1/+1 counter from Spike Rogue: Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature. {2}, Remove a +1/+1 counter from a creature you control: Put a +1/+1 counter on Spike Rogue.

card.name: Spike Weaver
card.text: Spike Weaver enters the battlefield with three +1/+1 counters on it. {2}, Remove a +1/+1 counter from Spike Weaver: Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature. {1}, Remove a +1/+1 counter from Spike Weaver: Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt this turn.

card.name: Survival of the Fittest
card.text: {G}, Discard a creature card: Search your library for a creature card, reveal that card, and put it into your hand. Then shuffle your library.

card.name: Thalakos Drifters
card.text: Discard a card: Thalakos Drifters gains shadow until end of turn.

card.name: Thalakos Scout
card.text: Shadow Discard a card: Return Thalakos Scout to its owner's hand.

card.name: Theft of Dreams
card.text: Draw a card for each tapped creature target opponent controls.

card.name: Thopter Squadron
card.text: Flying Thopter Squadron enters the battlefield with three +1/+1 counters on it. {1}, Remove a +1/+1 counter from Thopter Squadron: Put a 1/1 colorless Thopter artifact creature token with flying onto the battlefield. Activate this ability only any time you could cast a sorcery. {1}, Sacrifice another Thopter: Put a +1/+1 counter on Thopter Squadron. Activate this ability only any time you could cast a sorcery.

card.name: Thrull Surgeon
card.text: {1}{B}, Sacrifice Thrull Surgeon: Look at target player's hand and choose a card from it. That player discards that card. Activate this ability only any time you could cast a sorcery.

card.name: Transmogrifying Licid
card.text: {1}, {T}: Transmogrifying Licid loses this ability and becomes an Aura enchantment with enchant creature. Attach it to target creature. You may pay {1} to end this effect. Enchanted creature gets +1/+1 and is an artifact in addition to its other types.

card.name: Treasure Hunter
card.text: When Treasure Hunter enters the battlefield, you may return target artifact card from your graveyard to your hand.

card.name: Treasure Trove
card.text: {2}{U}{U}: Draw a card.

card.name: Vampire Hounds
card.text: Discard a creature card: Vampire Hounds gets +2/+2 until end of turn.

card.name: Volrath's Dungeon
card.text: Pay 5 life: Destroy Volrath's Dungeon. Any player may activate this ability but only during his or her turn. Discard a card: Target player puts a card from his or her hand on top of his or her library. Activate this ability only any time you could cast a sorcery.

card.name: Wall of Nets
card.text: Defender At end of combat, exile all creatures blocked by Wall of Nets. When Wall of Nets leaves the battlefield, return all cards exiled with Wall of Nets to the battlefield under their owners' control.

card.name: Wayward Soul
card.text: Flying {U}: Put Wayward Soul on top of its owner's library.

card.name: Welkin Hawk
card.text: Flying When Welkin Hawk dies, you may search your library for a card named Welkin Hawk, reveal that card, put it into your hand, then shuffle your library.

card.name: Whiptongue Frog
card.text: {U}: Whiptongue Frog gains flying until end of turn.

card.name: Wood Elves
card.text: When Wood Elves enters the battlefield, search your library for a Forest card and put that card onto the battlefield. Then shuffle your library.

card.name: Workhorse
card.text: Workhorse enters the battlefield with four +1/+1 counters on it. Remove a +1/+1 counter from Workhorse: Add {C} to your mana pool.

card.name: Zealots en-Dal
card.text: At the beginning of your upkeep, if all nonland permanents you control are white, you gain 1 life.
